title: Deutsch Uhr Watch Face
summary: A text-based German language watch face for Android Wear.
description: A text-based German language watch face for Android Wear. Great for learning German numbers, days, and months.Inspired by my favorite Pebble watch face (http://www.mypebblefaces.com/apps/1446/1484/).
descriptionHTML:
A text-based German language watch face for Android Wear. Great for learning German numbers, days, and months.

Inspired by my favorite Pebble watch face (http://www.mypebblefaces.com/apps/1446/1484/).
comments: It would be great if...... I like your watch very much, but it would be much more better if you add some of the following: add option to change the background color and the font color, add weather and battery level, und vielen dank im voraus üòÅ
recentChanges: Package standalone app for Android Wear 2.0.
